Message
Follow

About
Founder Director of Centre Space, Singapore, is a Psychologist,
Personal Relationship Counselor & Clinical Hypnotherapist - affiliate,
British Society of Clinical Hypnotherapists, (Membership No 13806).
Professional Certification includes: a Masters in Industrial
Psychology, Post-Graduate Diploma in Human Resources
Management, Diploma in Counseling and Diploma in Clinical
Hypnotherapy accredited to the British Society of Clinical
Hypnotherapists.
Having lived in India, the Middle East, Australia, Europe and
Singapore with professional working experience spanning 15 years,
numerous cross cultural challenges and experiences became the
pivot for her Self-Transformation wherein she sought answers to the
deepest issues of 'Meaning' and 'Purpose' of 'Life'. Wherever she
went, Jefferin spontaneously re-invented herself and excelled in
looking at adversity as an opportunity for personal growth and
freedom, maintaining her passion and zest to Thrive by Living &
Learning,
offer therapeutic healing by integrating counseling with
hypnotherapy, synchronizing the mind and body by releasing past
emotional baggage, traumas, afflictions, conflicts and repressed
energies thereby effecting healing of your subconscious mind. Once
healing takes place you can unleash and harness the amazing wealth
within your subconscious mind and get it to work for you efficiently
and effectively. By tapping into the superior capacities and
actualizing your full potential you can move forward from a life of
self-imposed limitation to a life of ABUNDANCE

about_section.summary: Founder Director of Centre Space, Singapore. Psychologist, Personal Relationship Counselor & Clinical Hypnotherapist with 15 years of international experience.

about_section.therapeutic_approach: Integrating counseling with hypnotherapy to synchronize mind and body and release emotional baggage.
